title: Rubenstein Provides an Investing Master Class
itunes:title: Rubenstein Provides an Investing Master Class
description:
Carlyle Group Co-Founder David Rubenstein discusses his new book How to Invest: Masters on the Craft.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
